ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF((CEC_Updated_from_IWT__c =false), IF( AND( $Profile.Name=="UPS CEC SRC User", ISCHANGED(OwnerId), OR ( Case_Owner_Role__c != null, AND ( CONTAINS(CEC_Original_Queue_Name__c, "CEC"), NOT(CONTAINS(CEC_Original_Queue_Name__c, "SRC")))) ), True, False ), False )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cases cannot be assigned to this queue or user.
